articles.author: Matt Wales
articles.title: Hi-Fi Rush 2, potential new Dishonored game were reportedly being pitched by now-closed Xbox studios - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: Arkane Austin and Tango Gameworks were reportedly in the process of pitching sequels to two much-loved titles - namely …
articles.content: Arkane Austin and Tango Gameworks were reportedly in the process of pitching sequels to two much-loved titles - namely Hi-Fi Rush 2 and a potential new Dishonored game - when Microsoft made the shock… [+2976 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Whooping cough epidemic sweeps Europe, health agency says - Reuters
articles.description: European countries have reported a surge in whooping cough cases in 2023 and the first quarter of 2024, with 10 times as many identified as in each of the previous two years.

articles.title: Complex Beauty in the Gulf of Oman - nasa.gov
articles.description: NASA’s newest Earth science satellite captured a striking image of swirling bands of phytoplankton.
